remarks: The covers relation implies no in-betweenness.  Part of proof of Lemma 7.5.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: cvnbtwn4 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ C e. CH ) -> ( A <oH B -> ( ( A C_ C /\ C C_ B ) -> ( C = A \/ C = B ) ) ) ) $.
